name: DROP
title: drop.space
shortDescription: DROP is a simple file sharing platform designed to facilitate the easy sending and sharing of large files up to 10GB. Ideal for professionals and businesses needing to share large documents, media files, or project data quickly and securely. An example use case includes a video production company sharing raw footage with remote editors.
pros: Supports large file sizes up to 10GB
cons: No advanced security options like encryption at rest

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: WeTransfer
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers similar large file transfer service

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Filemail
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Supports sending larger files up to 50GB
